properties.title: Three high-altitude lakes
properties.abstract: Discover our three high-altitude lakes at 1,800 m located at the foot of Grand Chamossaire, the culminating point of the region. The lake's sparkling surfaces gave rise to many tales and legends. The fairies are waiting for you...
properties.description:
In the olden days, a great many fairies lived near Lake Bretaye. The shepherds could see them dance every night on the meadows of Grand Chamossaire, or even surprise them sleeping under a huge rhododendron.

It is said that Lady Isabeau’s box of precious jewels still lies at the bottom of Lake Chavonnes and that the beautiful lady, transformed into a fairy, still watches over it… The region of Bretaye and its three high-altitude lakes abounds in a great many stories. Take an easily accessible hike in this idyllic region and discover its rich preserved nature and its fabulous stories.
properties.name: Villars Tourisme
